title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2 and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same features as Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package integrating Ollama models as LangChain LLM & chat components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI with chat history, syntax highlighting, and plugins.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub-Copilot-like inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB + Streamlit UI.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger (CI) module to cache and serve Ollama models inside GitHub Actions pipelines.

title: ollama-node-red
summary: Node-RED nodes to prompt Ollama models from IoT flows.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin for inline code generation, explanation, and refactoring via Ollama.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes, brainstorm ideas, and answer questions locally.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator & OllamaEmbedder nodes.

title: ollama-grpc
summary: gRPC server wrapper around Ollama REST API for high-performance micro-services.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight React chatbot component that talks to Ollama over fetch/SSE.
